original_title: For Those Who Poisoned the Moonlit Night
overview: Yesterday I was there,it was a planet of rock and water;other than that I just remembered the blue.. .. then someone told from my left that you overslept. Prisoners of impossible dreams listening to the story of a king who wants to build a map as big as his country.. 'But you are supposed to tell me a different story!' - 'Am I?',the spider replied.

production_companies.name: Film and Television Institute of India

title: For Those Who Poisoned the Moonlit Night
